entities.description: The month in which the respondent first used hallucinogens.
The amount of time since the respondent last used hallucinogens.
Total number of days the respondent used hallucinogens in the past 12 months.
An indicator that shows if the total use days is trimmed relative to the 30-day frequency.
An indicator that shows if the total use days is trimmed if the respondent used hallucinogens for less than 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent refused to answer the question.
Indicates whether the response was left blank.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to the month of their first hallucinogen use.
Relates the respondent to the time since their last hallucinogen use.
Relates the respondent to the total number of days they used hallucinogens in the past 12 months.
Associates the total use days in past 12 months with the trimming indicator.
Associates the total use days in past 12 months with the trimmed use indicator.
Indicates that the response was refused.
Indicates that the response was left blank.
